name: @tpmjs/tools-tool-call-accuracy-score
description: Scores the accuracy of actual tool calls against expected tool calls in agent workflows

tools.name: toolCallAccuracyScoreTool
tools.description: Scores the accuracy of actual tool calls against expected tool calls

parameters.name: expected
parameters.description: Expected tool calls with tool name and arguments

parameters.name: actual
parameters.description: Actual tool calls made with tool name and arguments

returns.description: Score object with accuracy metrics and detailed comparison
